to.sven.androidrccar.host.accessorycommunication.contract

Interface IAccessoryConnectorListener


  • public interface IAccessoryConnectorListener
    Informs the implementor when something happens in the AccessoryConnector.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void accessoryDetached()
      The opened accessory was detached from the phone.
      void accessoryOpend()
      An accessory was connected and it was successfully opened.
      void error(int resId, java.lang.Object... args)
      Something went wrong during connecting to the accessory.

    • Method Detail

      • accessoryOpend

        void accessoryOpend()
        An accessory was connected and it was successfully opened. The IAccessoryCommunication is set in the IHostDependencyContainer.

      • accessoryDetached

        void accessoryDetached()
        The opened accessory was detached from the phone.

      • error

        void error(int resId,
         java.lang.Object... args)
        Something went wrong during connecting to the accessory.
        Parameters:
        resId - Android String Resource id
        args - Additional arguments that will be used to format the string resource.
        See Also:
        Context#getText(int), String.format(String, Object...)
